website_summaries.verdict: A pair of versatile core sliders with dual sides. These top-selling sliders are an eye-catching electric green.
pros: Seven-inch core sliders have a foam side for hard, smooth surfaces and a plastic side for carpet or turf
An exercise manual detailing five exercises is included
cons: Some users have had a difficult time keeping their feet on the sliders while exercising

customer_reviews.title: Problem Solved.
customer_reviews.text: I committed to do 80 Day Obsession by Beachbody buy my order was delayed three weeks. You need these immediately, so I ordered them and prayed they didn't suck. They didn't suck. They're actually better than the BB ones, IMO. They slide perfectly in my carpet and hardwood floors (I workout in my living room or family room.) Your feet (in shoes) don't slide off the disks. I am pleased and would buy again. (PS I'm a plus sized gal, my weight did not impede them from sliding which I wondered about. So, my fluffy gals, this product IS for you too!)
customer_reviews.author: Amber L

customer_reviews.title: My abs hurt :P
customer_reviews.text: I would hands down buy these again! They work great on both carpet (even my longer-ish carpet) and my hard wood floors. They're exactly as described, the perfect size, and absolutely perfect for the 80 day obsession. Nothing negative to say (except that my abs are killing me!)
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Great product to intensify any workout!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I purchased two sets of these sliders (one in pink, the other in black) for my wife and I as we’re starting 80 Day Obsession. Whether you’re doing this workout or another of your own, these work great. They are holding up very well and really work your body, especially on core exercises. They’re a good size. They fit my wife’s smaller foot and my larger one. They aren’t too big for her or small for me. For those looking to get in shape, these really help in adding balance to exercises and they intensify other workout moves very well. I rate a perfect 5/5. Thank you for reading and rating my review!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon SteveTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loved these, me too :)
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wife when she started the 80 Day Obsession workout. They came quickly and are exactly what she was looking for, especially the pink. After seeing her use them a few days, I decided to give them a try to see just how sturdy they were. I must say, these things are great! I used them in my gym on the short carpet floor and they slid nicely with my 180 lbs on them. Then I flipped them over and tried them on hardwood floor, still slid along well. I was impressed. SO after seeing the benefits and ease of use, I'm ordering a set for myself in a less feminine color.
customer_reviews.author: Shane K

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I tried them for the first time, and the cloth at the bottom ripped off on one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: These Are GARBAGE & Do Not Slide Easily
customer_reviews.text: These truly SUCK. Unless you have access to that fake grassy stuff, these do not slide easily. Not on rugs/ carpets or wood floors. It is met with a lot of resistance which defeats the purpose of the sliders. After one use, they are hella scraped and they’re going in #LeTRASH.
customer_reviews.author: Let's Keep It Real

customer_reviews.title: It is NOT made for hard wood floors like it claims
customer_reviews.text: Whether or not you have shoes, sock, barefoot while using this... your foot will slip off therefore interrupting your workout. It is NOT made for hard wood floors like it claims. These have scratched my floors so bad. And when my foot slides off in the middle of a mountain climber, I busted a toe! Not at all what they claim to be. Paper towels or paper plates work better.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I do a reformer Pilates class every day and wanted to get at least a minimal workout at home while everything is closed down. I was so looking forward to trying these and keeping up part of my fitness program. Sadly, these suck. I tried them on my wood tile floor, my low density carpet, my smooth garage floor and they were extremely hard to move smoothly. I feel like I should have just burned a $20 bill.
customer_reviews.author: LNspins

customer_reviews.title: Work well on laminate floors, but the workouts are all TOO difficult for me to do
customer_reviews.text: The quality exceeded my expectations for such an economical price. Since COVID, I haven’t returned to my gym, and have been stocking up my home workout equipment. I am in my 60’s, but have had a very active workout program for 20+ years, but these discs are REALLY hard! They work exactly as promised, but I don’t know how much I’ll use them. Maybe I’ll grow in endurance? Product is great, but too strenuous for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Reading and Sewing in South Carolina

customer_reviews.title: A bit too small for use on rugs, but good for hardwood/linoleum
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for use on my rug, and I'm finding that its design is lacking. The combination of smallish diameter and shallow lip around the perimeter causes it to catch on the rug which causes my foot to slide off. If using it for abs, it'll probably work a bit better than the leg/groin exercises I'm using it for. That said, I've used it on my hardwood floor without incident (though I'm worried it'll scuff up the floor if I don't thoroughly sweep before using these, though that's not necessarily a fault of the product). Bottom line - works okay, and great price. Also, if you have thin carpet or hard surface floors you won't have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sliders! Comfy & controlled !
customer_reviews.text: These are a great set of sliders, there come with foam padding for the inside that contact your feet, which offers support and some measure of 'grip'. While the sliding pad has just enough resistance to offer an easy slide effect while maintaining some resistance, that gives each move real control. Pretty Damn good at any price point actually. If you are on the fence, go for it, it's a great buy and an effective workout tool when used correctly!
customer_reviews.author: Ubersocrates

customer_reviews.title: Great sliders
customer_reviews.text: They are great they work well on my hardwood and my carpets. They seem to be even better when I use them with bare feet, rather then with shoes. However, I do wish this were more rectangle then round because they tend to collide when I do certain exercises like mountain climbers. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: shanna

customer_reviews.title: I love my sliders!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these but the only problem is that it’s not the most ideal for hardwood floors. From my experience, they might scratch the floor if other things get caught under it. For example, I was working out at a public gym and I think someone left dirt/small rocks on the hardwood floors (from their shoes) prior to my arrival. I used my sliders and it scratched the floors. I’m just happy they weren’t my floors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money...these are awful.
customer_reviews.text: The worst...they don’t slide. I tried a mat (horrible, zero movement) on both sides. I tried on a rug, almost as bad. And they’re totally flat, no curve at all. The hardest part of the workout becomes trying to lift my weight off the slider so that it will move. Wish I had saved the package...I would definitely return this.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.

customer_reviews.title: They work great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sliders to use during "A Little Obsessed," and "80 Day Obsession" when that starts later this month. I have loved these sliders! They work just as advertised. I use them on carpet, and they slide around just as they should. I have not tried them on hardwood floor, but I assume they would work equally as well. (To use on hardwood, you just flip them over). They also seem quite durable, and I am confident they will last a long time. I am very happy with my purchase, and look forward to using them with 80 Day Obsession on Beachbody!
customer_reviews.author: E. B.

customer_reviews.title: ON MY WAY TO STRONGER CORE
customer_reviews.text: I use sliders at the gym but never thought I would buy them for my home use. Working to a stronger core is hard as hell especially if you are 60 and have wood floors in your home. Anyway, I bought them and have been between gym visits. They definitely do not scratch the floors, you get the same workout you would at the gym and God willingly, I am on my way to stronger core. That was the intent.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sliders for Beachbody's "a little obsessed" and then "80 day obsession". So far I am not disappointed. I have used on wood floor as well as laminate. There are times that my feet do slide off of the disc but it may be an operator problem... I do wish they had the fabric that slips over your shoes like the beach body ones have, but for the price and free shipping you cant beat it. Good product that doesn't damage the floor. I completed "a little obsessed" and am now 12 days in on "80 day" and I plan on using this set for the duration.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: I used something like these when I was doing an Express workout at ...
customer_reviews.text: I used something like these when I was doing an Express workout at work and I like the concept of how these worked. So when I went out to purchase gliders I noticed them and felt the price and what they offered were what I was looking for. I used them a few times and they slide nicely on the rug floor I have in my basement. I have a large foot so they were big enough to handle the ball part of the sneaker. They seem sturdy enough to hold up for a while so I know they would last a while with regular usage. I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: P. Feola

customer_reviews.title: Useful but not great
customer_reviews.text: These are ok sliders. I got them because I was starting an 80 day program but I wasn’t sure if I was going to end up committing to the program. Well, i ended up committing and the sliders have worked but when comparing the design to the ones with my program I can tell a difference. My foot slips off sometimes but I make it work. If I knew for sure I would be using sliders frequently, I’d opt for the brand name ones ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: TOO SLIPPERY
customer_reviews.text: In order for dual-sided sliders to work, BOTH sides have to be slippery. Unfortunately, this means that your feet will slip off one side, limiting your ability to do prototypical workouts such as mountain climbers. Skip the dual-sided use and pick the right slider for your floor type.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the small, small for the large
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my wife, who is 4'-11", and she loves it. It fits her feet and hands well. She uses it on the carpet and says it slides great. We haven't tried it on tile since our apartment is mostly carpet. She would give it 5-stars for use on carpet; however, they do seem a bit small for me (I am over 6' tall), so I can't give it a perfect rating. Great product for those on smaller side. For those who are larger like me, I'd look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Greg and Renee B

customer_reviews.title: Work fine but disc is smaller
customer_reviews.text: The disc is kinda small for the feet. I’ve used them a few times In my living room on carpet. Slides fine just feel like they could be a bit bigger. I tried in kitchen once and scratched the crap out of the bottoms. ( it wasn’t even a full workout it was literally just slide up an down once ) I’m 5’3 and weigh 135. Gave descriptions so you can get the gist of my feet not being huge hahaha but they work fine for what I use them for.
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: Perfect idea for carpet exercises!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving my sliders! I am able to do side lunges and back lunges with ease on my carpet now and BOY do they kill your legs way more than a regular, old-fashioned lunge. My behind has been killing me after I use these sliders which is great because I know it's working. I usually do the 30 pound bar and do lunges but using these sliders to do lunges REALLY works your legs and butt. GREAT IDEA!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Convenient & Durable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these core sliders (in pink!) so I could try out some low-impact exercises, and I am truly impressed with Synergee's quality. The disks are large, they would be comfortable to use for people with normal and large shoe sizes. I originally planned to use these at the gym, but when I got them I realized I could use them at home on my carpet as well. The reversible sides for wood and carpet floors is convenient, you can exercise anywhere (no excuses left)! I've been using these core sliders weekly, and they seem very durable, like they will last for a long while to come. Plus I love the fun colors they offer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great tool for a cord workout and legs it works great it may need a bit of modification
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to do my 80 day Obsession workout. does lighters are great for carpet. But on the floor it makes a lot of noise when sliding. Overall they are great making your core engaged more and better workout tool for your legs as well. the only thing I don't like is that it doesn't have a way to keep your feet stay better on them if you happen to be sliding off. The ones on the 80-day Beachbody have like a little material around it so you feet don't slide out and this ones do not so that detail makes me be more careful about keeping my feet from sliding off them.
customer_reviews.author: miroslava

customer_reviews.title: They really work for me
customer_reviews.text: I keep my Synergee Core Sliders at the ready right near my desk. Every so often I leave the desk chair and begin a 10 minute workout with the Sliders, right there on the same hardwood floor my desk is on. It's convenient, and they don't damage the floor! I started out slow and gradually expanded my reach. Quite a workout. Rather than limiting me, the Sliders let me extend the right amount, and that amount is growing as I build strength.
customer_reviews.author: Henk

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give these a try and they do help make some exercises better. Pushups, mountain climbers. It comes with a sheet that shows you some exercises you can do, I’m sure there are others one could figure out to add. I’m new to an exercise routine and I’m glad I gave them a try. I like the color options and they were a good price. They care about the customer, which I really appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: WooGirl

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't slide at all on my carpet.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work well on carpet at all. So I purchased sliding disk for heavey furniture. The best.
customer_reviews.author: Aasya

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Only try this product on a carpet. The size of the sliders is quite big. They do not slide as smoothly as I had expected. Due to the big size, it requires more effort to slide them. It may work for some, but not for me. My biggest disappointment is I got the sliders with full of scratches already. I thought these are brand new. I guess this is what I get for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Using on a slippery tile floor and doing good so far. Did mountain climbers with hands on them and also with feet (feels like an ab wheel for one side if using hands - really good for core). I leave on gym shoe on floor and foot on disc barefooted. I feel it's the best control and can isolate the motion best.
customer_reviews.author: k.c. beautiful

customer_reviews.title: A bit small
customer_reviews.text: I use mine on carpet and they’re difficult to control. They feel small too. I’m a women’s size 10 in shoes and I always have to constantly adjust my feet or I’ll fall off
customer_reviews.author: Mireiyah

customer_reviews.title: Look for a different product
customer_reviews.text: These discs are nothing like those I've used at my gym. They're too small; feet slide right off, though they work somewhat when used with the hands. The discs at my gym are somewhat bowl-shaped, and there's no issue of sliding off. But that, of course, rules out their use for dual surfaces. I recommend keep looking -- elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Magoo

customer_reviews.title: SMOOTH SLIDING!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sliders after seeing people using them everywhere! My gym didn't offer them and I don't like going to the gym and seeing the equipment I wanted to use MIA anyways so I decided to purchase a set for my gym bag to take with me! I use the hard plastic side on the gym carpet floor and they glide so smoothly! These make my ab workouts a lot more fun and definitely is a challenge especially the pikes! I would buy again and would recommend buying these for yourself or any of your friends who are looking for a great way to train abs or adding a twist to their leg day routines!
customer_reviews.author: cleonard

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended, love the challenge they add to my workouts
customer_reviews.text: These sliders work perfectly for what I wanted. I'm using them with a popular home workout program and they were cheaper than the ones sold by that company and they work just as well. I have not used these on hard floor but they work just fine on my rug. I'm glad I purchased them, as they definitely add a challenge to my workouts! I would highly recommend these to anyone looking to add a new and challenging element to their workouts.
customer_reviews.author: mistydawn

customer_reviews.title: As pictured
customer_reviews.text: They are doing what they are meant to do for my daughter who is on lock down and needs to stay in shape for gymnastics. The only thing is she wishes they were larger in diameter. She is 16 and they are almost to small for both feet to fit on one when doing the exercise that she needed them for. It requires two feet on one.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with these. They are very cheap and too small. My feet kept coming off of these every time I used them for work outs. I ended up spending more money and getting a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Way better than paper plates!
customer_reviews.text: I recently needed Core sliders for a new workout program I started. In the past I would use frisbees or paper plates. But I wanted the real thing to get a good workout. I really like them! Once I got use to the amount of pressure I needed to put on them so my foot wouldn’t fall off, I got an amazing workout. I use mine on Carpet and they glide right over it. Even my 7 year old granddaughter used them! Would definitely recommend these sliders.
customer_reviews.author: Justsuern

customer_reviews.title: Great for slider workouts.
customer_reviews.text: We have laminate floors in all the living areas and carpet in the bedrooms. I have 3 young kids and try to snag a work out it whatever way I can. I really like these because the price was great. They have held up wonderfully, my kids play with them all the time to "ice skate" around the house. They slide wonderfully on both our carpet and and hard floor, but not so much that I cannot maintain my balance and fall on the floor. It does come with a list of instructions and workouts, but you can also search online for a lot of options.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to home gym
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have for any workout requiring sliders. I use the soft side on my hardwood floor with zero damage. The hard side doesn't slide well on any of my workout mats, but then again those mats are designed to be non-slip. I imagine it would do just fine on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea, poor execution
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea behind the product and the price is fair. However, the design is flawed. Your feet will always slide off mid workout so it makes you feel like you shouldn’t even use them. Should have put a lip around them so if your feet slide off they would still work. I’m sad they didn’t work like I expected, I should have spent a bit more money for a better pair.
customer_reviews.author: cholt22

customer_reviews.title: You will sweat like crazy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received them today and used them today after my 20 minute treadmill workout. For $10.00 this is a great product to add to my exercise regime. I did mountain climbers with them and these little sliders brought the intesity. I was already sweating from my treadmill workout but after adding the sliders afterwards I was sweating like crazy even after I took my shower. I had my doubts but I'm glad my God/Lord blessed me with them. Prime shipping was great.
customer_reviews.author: Debmun1215

customer_reviews.title: Good at first but after only 2 months of using them they’re useless
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in March but didn’t actually start using them until the end of May. It’s now the end of July and they are pretty much useless on my wood floors now. The cushioned side for wood floors no longer glide easily on my floors which makes them next to impossible to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon V.

customer_reviews.title: More grip than slip
customer_reviews.text: I looked forward to getting these, but when I tried them out on low pile/smooth carpet, they didn’t slide easily at all! As a matter of fact I had to look online for videos to see how much effort others used with sliders. I grabbed a pair of plastic picnic plates and found they slid easier.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Smith

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Being someone who workes a ton, I'm always on the lookout for products I can bring to work or on the go with me. Core work is something I try to focus on, but doing the normal crunch wasn't cutting it. I was so happy to find the product and fingers were crossed it would work as advertised. I've used them 6-8 times so far and am happy to report they are 100% to my satisfaction! I use them for both core and leg work, and see the benefits already! They do not scratch wood floor and guide nicely with each exercise. Bottom like purchase a set, you won't be sorry!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Swegles

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I love these sliders! I’ve been using them on my carpet downstairs and they slide super easily. I will note that I tried them initially upstairs where we have long shaggy carpet. It was harder upstairs. However they work perfectly on normal length carpet. I bought them to work out and I work out downstairs so I am perfectly happy. These are great.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Beachbody slides
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these so that I could do a second round of the program 80 Day Obsession, after doing the first round with the Beachbody slides - these work so much better. I love that the pads are attached to the slides and don't slide off as you are using them. I haven't tried them on carpet yet, but they do work great on hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Ann

customer_reviews.title: Multi-functional: dual surface, sturdy but lightweight. Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are dual sided so I can use them on carpet and hard flooring. I haven't tried it out on any sensitive surfaces that could scratch wood floors, but the texture is smooth and I wouldn't foresee any issues. They are large enough for my feet and hands, but not too large to throw in a suitcase when I travel. I like that they are light-weight, but sturdy. I've only had them a limited amount of time, but so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing on carpet
customer_reviews.text: I have been “trying” to use these for 3-weeks now. The reason for “trying” they do not glide smoothly which messes your steps up. In addition, I almost broke my toes twice due to the abrupt stop in the sliding motion. I am hesitant to try on hardwood...worried I will scratch up my floors.
customer_reviews.author: K lee

customer_reviews.title: Flexible use Gliding Discs
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been through rehab for hip replacement and it is important to keep all muscles in tone. I was introduced to sliders by my physical therapist and found they helped both in the knee and groin areas, but his was made only for tile floors. The Synergee gliding discs are great as I can use them on tile or flip over and use on rugs so they are great to bring on travel or use in front of the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: So great my son keeps borrowing them!
customer_reviews.text: These are great sliders. I started the 80 day obsession training program through Beachbody and you need sliders for this program. These are GREAT for that program. I have dogs, so I can't have nice flooring. I have laminate flooring, and these slide great on these floors. My feet do not come off the sliders and I'm starting to get definition to my abs. My son is using them on a carpeted surface and he has no problems either. All in all, a great buy. I'd recommend these. A MAJOR plus was the prime shipping. These came quick, which I really appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica A Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Small but nice
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought, but they do slide nicely. Using these for my home work outs until the gyms reopen.
customer_reviews.author: Ken and Sheri

customer_reviews.title: May not glide as easily as described on wood flooring.
customer_reviews.text: I have wood flooring and these disks did not glide as smoothly as I had hoped. The plus side was it made my workout more intense. I would prefer to glide and not push and scrape on days I choose a less intense workout. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: smiley face

customer_reviews.title: Good product for 80DO
customer_reviews.text: I am using these for 80DO. They slide nice on carpet (the pink side down) and my shoes don’t slide around or off of the black side. The only time I have struggled are the moves that want both feet on one slide. My shoes sometimes catch on the carpet (they are smaller than the slides from Beachbody but I didn’t want to deal with separate covers) and make it harder to slide, but I have been able to work through it. They were a good price and I received them quickly. The color was as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: These are half-size versions of what you would see in the gym. Very cute and okay for adults for exercises where you only use the ball of your foot. For full range of motion, I just use two per foot. But best is for little kids just wanting to slide around while you exercise.
customer_reviews.author: paul mktv

customer_reviews.title: Works great on carpets!
customer_reviews.text: As someone that has been paying for a gym membership for YEARS and has never gone, I figured it was time to bring the gym to my house. I was not looking for weights or products that would build bulk... and so I looked into these Core Sliders. BOY, do they give you a burning workout!! I have carpeted floors and so sliding around was very difficult until I tried these sliders. They are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They don't slide on my berber carpet
customer_reviews.text: These do not slide well on my berber carpet at all. I spend more time trying to get my feet to stay on them because my feet slide off due to the discs not sliding. I've tried them a few times and gave up on them. Not sure what the trick is all the people use to get them to slide that have reviewed with high compliments. I just can't get these discs to slide in any position.
customer_reviews.author: TLM67

customer_reviews.title: Not as slippery on carpet as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my carpet, but it's not as slippery on the carpet as I expected it to be. The smooth side of the discs seem like they would slide easily, but for some reason, there is some friction and it doesn't slide as easily as I think it should.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne K. Kamiya

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been weight lifting for over 10yrs. Bodybuilding, powerlifting, Olympic lifting. These sliders are definitely worth it. They are even better quality than I expected. They’re hard, not bendable which I actually really like. They slide extremely easy on hardwood or carpet. Definitely not “beginner” sliders if you’ve never tried them before. But if you’ve been into fitness for a while you’ll be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette B.

customer_reviews.title: I love Synergee too :)
customer_reviews.text: I originally was looking for a set of the synergee mini bands. I am unable to find them. (I simply wanted o one of each color). My trainer used them during a session and they were phenomenal and challenging. Although i was unable to find those, i found these gliders which were equally as awesome. I looked up additional excercises to perform online. Great way to kick your workout up a notch.
customer_reviews.author: trophygurl

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to your workout.
customer_reviews.text: These sliders work great (using them on my carpet, so hard moves I put down my mat bc they are very slick). I bought them in preparation for A Little Bit Obsessed and 80 day obsession from Beach Body. I’ve never used sliders before and it gives another level to your workouts. I’m also very uncoordinated so I’m still trying to master using them in certain moves.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Double sided; no "cover" to remember
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sliders to reduce impact on my joints & still be able to add intensity to my core workouts. I have a bad left knee and a bad right ankle so certain moves have too much impact (mountain climbers, anyone?). I have used these sliders on tile, pergo (fake hardwood), and carpet. The movement is seamless regardless of the flooring. I workout at home & at my office. I love that these are double sided so I don't have to worry about making sure I have the "cover" that other products come with for the floor transition. Time to say goodbye to the paper plates that I have been destroying.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at home exercise
customer_reviews.text: These are almost just like furniture slide protectors but different enough to require these which are made for this purpose. I needed them to work on carpet so I could do extension exercises to work my core and they are exactly what I needed! Very easy to use and they work just like I need them too. Not super 'slick' but glide in a way that still gives me the control I need. I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mobetta T

customer_reviews.title: Simply slick slippery slider
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. You will get your core and legs workout while your arms get some isometric loading. Suggestion: When you use it on a carpet, friction will produce electrostatic charging of the sliders. This attracts dust already present nearby. If you don't want to see the dust on the black rubbery surface of the slider, use a lint-removing roller to take off the dust (the kind where you peel off a layer of sticky paper tape after it no longer works.)
customer_reviews.author: In2Boats

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these a little while ago to add to my exercise routine and challenge myself. They have done just that. They are easy to use, and because I have different surfaces in my home (tile, carpet and thicker foam squares in my workout area) I have been able to use the sliders on each surface without any problem. They also travel easy so I can get a difficult workout in, without adding any bulk to my luggage. I have since recommended them to a friend who has also purchased them. I don't think you can go wrong if you select these sliders over the many others that are offered.
customer_reviews.author: INC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sliders!
customer_reviews.text: These are nicely made, standard sliders, that accommodate rugs or hardwood floors. Exercising from home, you can't go wrong. The bright lime green were available for immediate shipping, that's the color I wanted, and they arrived as promised, nicely packaged in a box. They come with instructions, and even if you have experience with them, instructions are very nice; also come with a coupon for another purchase. Totally satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Graceful

customer_reviews.title: Grab carpet rather than slide - only work for limited range.
customer_reviews.text: These don’t slide well unless your weight is almost directly over them — IE a pike position rather than a plank position. I am returning them. We grabbed some furniture sliders from the local hardware store. They are cheaper and slide well. They are rectangular rather than round.
customer_reviews.author: MA girl

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I have always used this product in the gym in certain classes and thought wow I could do these moves with this product at home. So I finally bought the sliders and have not been disappointed. The sliders work great on my carpet and floors. I even take them with me to the gym when I'm not planning on taking a class. They fit perfectly in my gym bag and I plan on taking them when I travel too. There are so many moves you can do with this product. It even comes with visual guidelines on how to use them. This product is definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Miller

customer_reviews.title: good sliders
customer_reviews.text: These are great, gym quality sliders. You can use one side for hardwood and the plastic side for carpet. They're excellent for all sorts of exercises including floor ab workouts and standing glue and leg workouts.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Get yours
customer_reviews.text: I needed these really bad. They are great especially to keep me active even on days I dont work out I use these for a quick 10 to 15 min work out. They are good because we can use it for a full body work out because you can switch it up.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof3basedinphilly

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the bright green disks and the boring black disks were delivered - not a huge issue
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the bright green disks and the boring black disks were delivered - not a huge issue, they work the same, but would have been nice to get exactly what i had ordered and paid for. I also noticed they only came in some plastic sleeves, not professionally packaged, no instruction or idea booklet, which would have been nice... but i googled!! The disks work great, very challenging and allows for creativity in your workout, i've been using them a lot and seeing and feeling results, which is nice, as i work out a lot and it takes a lot for me to get a burn on my muscles sometimes. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JKLA

customer_reviews.title: These work great on the rubber gym floor mats!!!
customer_reviews.text: These work great on the rubber gym floor mats!!! I didn’t try them on hard floors or carpet but many reviews say they work well on those surfaces. I’ve been using them on the tile-like gym rubber mats that interlock in my garage the last couple weeks. They are not impossibly slippery for stationary positions but glide very smoothly and easily for active movement. Your shoes don’t slip on the “grip” side too. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AnotherShopper

customer_reviews.title: Whole Body Burn
customer_reviews.text: These sliders are no joke. If you use them the right way you will definitely feel the burn. You can use them for arms abs and legs. I use them for pilates and it is the only piece of equipment I need.
customer_reviews.author: David Shefchik

customer_reviews.title: Great Core Sliders!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality of these sliders. I bought them because I was trying out BeachBody's "A Little Obsessed" program and it requires sliders, which I didn't have. They arrived quickly and looked great. I used them on both wood floor and carpet, and although they work better on wood floor, they still worked well on carpet. I really like these sliders and continue to use them a lot particularly for core and leg workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Silvana Barone

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic. They work well on both carpet and hard ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these sliders as a part of my new workout journey and I didn't want to spend too much. These are fantastic. They work well on both carpet and hard floors or tile and I like the fact I got to pick out of several color options. They are not real big or bulky, about 8", so it doesn't take much room to store them and they don't add any weight to my bags. This is a great purchase for anyone wanting to add some variety to their workout programs!
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sliders!
customer_reviews.text: I needed some sliders to help with my beachbody on demand ab workouts. I wanted some that worked on both carpet and wood floors. These sliders are amazing! They work perfectly on carpet using the pink side and just as amazing on wood floors using the black side. I’ve used these numerous times and have had zero issues, no marks on the floor and they slide beautifully. I’m extremely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SwanMD

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: First off this comes with a basic instruction page. It's worth taking note of. I purchased these because they are close to a set of sliders that I had in the past. This set lives in my living room and all of my flatmates jump on them from time to time. I use these for doing core workouts. I happen to love them. As with anything results are based on your individual dedication. They do work on both hard wood and carpet floors.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Great strength training!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these sliders for almost a month now and they are great. I have used them both barefoot and with shoes on with no issues. They work well on carpet, rugs, and tile. For the tile I flip them over so the soft side is facing down, that way nothing gets scratched. So far they provide great results with my workouts, I use them almost every day. They seem so simple and easy, but they provide intense workouts when used properly.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: I love warming up with the sliders and they work well ...
customer_reviews.text: These sliders work really well! I sustained a back injury over a year ago while kickboxing, and could barely do mountain climbers afterwards. After purchasing the sliders, I’ve been able to do them again with no pain. Not only that, I love warming up with the sliders and they work well on both carpeting and hardwood floors, both of which I have. I have no excuse not to ever use my sliders!
customer_reviews.author: Misslauren

customer_reviews.title: They work!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use them and I can feel the pain when I am done working out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: these were a nice smooth glide on my wood floors
customer_reviews.text: I have only used these once because, to be honest, I keep forgetting I even have them! However, these were a nice smooth glide on my wood floors, no matter how fast I was going. I did not have any problems keeping them under my feet and with me. I rather enjoyed using them. They also seemed to work great for picking up the dog hair while I worked out, LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Queen of Giants

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The sliders are a good size and have good “slip” to them on hardwood, although I have had some issues with them on carpet. Sometimes, if my feet aren’t exactly in the middle of the sliders on the carpet, the slider flips up and I have to reposition. This could be due to the pile of my carpet being a bit longer (not shag or long loop, but think longer tighter pile-very plush); regardless, it can be annoying in the middle of a set. Overall, these are a good size, quality, and value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sliders
customer_reviews.text: These sliding discs are great. I do hot core yoga, and sometimes the tops of my feet just can't handle the friction. These are great to use (I used bare feet) for any kind of hot core yoga or anything really. the slide on hardwood floors are really nice. it does have the other side for carpet use too. Easy to pack for on the go as well. I bought 2 sets of these, one for my daughter (she likes to skate around on them) and one for me and my yoga practice.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: No scratches!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Was worried as we only have hard wood throughout the house and didn't want to get them scratched however these never left a mark and are a fantastic addition to my workout routines!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great workout
customer_reviews.text: I love these core sliders. I used them some with a trainer and fell in love I knew I needed my own. I ordered these because of the color options and because they work on different surfaces. The color is true to what you see on the picture. I ordered the pink ones. Thus far I've used them at home on carpet with no issue, and on marble floor. Really good for working out the core; My abs and back feel great! I would recommend these to anyone, inexpensive, good quality and vibrant colors!
customer_reviews.author: Izza Bella

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am a beachbody coach and I bought these to preview our new program that will be released in January. They worked great, allow me to work my leggs and core even more. Love the bright pink, the color stands out well. Great seller and received quickly. Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.author: sweet2daeyes

customer_reviews.title: Glides well
customer_reviews.text: These work great, they do exactly what they were supposed to do. They even work decently on the rubber flooring with texture in my gym. Sometimes I take them on the go & use them on laminate flooring, wood flooring, tile flooring. They haven’t scratched anything. Also they are great for stretching & sliding into deeper stretch. Worth the price easily.
customer_reviews.author: NeapTide

customer_reviews.title: Full Body Work- Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sliders! I was looking for something to work my Mom Pooch on my lower abdomen and these are killing it! Not to mention they are fun, smooth and quick. I use them for 10-15 minutes at a time, up to three times a day. I can hop down, get to muscle failure quickly because they are so effective and carry on with my day. They come with a great little insert with a few exercises and instructions but really anything you do on these is working some part of your body- and you can feel it! Highly recommended if you’re trying to snatch your waist!
customer_reviews.author: Karma Alaska

customer_reviews.title: My feet slip off of these.
customer_reviews.text: These sliders work well on my wood floors, however my feet slip off of them. I use them with my BB On Demand workouts. I noticed the sliders they use in the workouts look slightly curved and have a "sleeve" that helps to prevent your foot from slipping. I've never used sliders before so I didn't know the advantage of a curved slider with a sleeve vs. one that is flat and no sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: kellym

customer_reviews.title: I’ve never used anything like these before
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sliders a month ago and have used them almost every day! I’ve used them on my hardwood floors and also my carpeted floors to try them on both surfaces and I’ve not had a single problem. I’ve never used anything like these before. They were recommended to me as a good routine to work my core harder and they have certainly delivered. Great product. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: FRS83

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to slide, does not help with range of motion
customer_reviews.text: Does not slide well on hardwood floors, feel like I’d have more success using a towel or even paper plates compared to these. Also, the plastic side scratched super easily despite never using the that side for any sliding on carpet. Now, I don’t even want to use these because the scratches are so deep and uncomfortable to touch. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: A complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: A complete waste of money. I bought these because of all the great reviews. They will not slide on my kitchen floor. My feet are continually sliding off of them. Not at all what the reviews I read claimed
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to my Gym Routine!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sliders! The work great on my carpet at home and at the gym, I use them for core work and for leg day. They are awesome for pulsing lunges and for making glute bridges a little more interesting. The material is really nice, I was nervous about them getting dirty so I just purchased the all black ones. Super easy to toss in your gym bag but still big enough to serve their purpose well!
customer_reviews.author: Becca Rod

customer_reviews.title: Works as needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was needing, as recommended by my physical therapist for specific exercises. Best quality is the dual-side usage: I travel frequently for business and having the ability to use these sliders on both carpet and hard floors has been great. The felt/padded side does get dirty a bit - picks up dust quickly - but if you clean the dust bunnies, you’ll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Scott

customer_reviews.title: FEEL THE BURN!
customer_reviews.text: Who would have known these discs could pack such a powerful punch! They work extremely well on carpet, I don’t have hardwood so I can’t attest to that. Mine were in good repair and have been enjoying the versatility and compact size of this product ! I have been doing “climbing” on the floor which burns worse than when I hike extremely steep mountains. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Bare Feet not so good when using on wood floor side, better to use with shoes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use on my wood floors. I like that they are designed or dual use (carpet or hard surface). I feel that the hard side is a little slippery under my bare feet. I like to workout in my bare feet because I am doing a combination of Bar and Pilates, combined with sliders. I feel they might be fine if you were using them on carpet with bare feet, but the reverse is a little slippery. For that reason I can only give 4 stars. Otherwise these are great sliders.
customer_reviews.author: PaulaBear66

customer_reviews.title: Great for adding to your workout!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sliders! They take my workouts to another level! Love that they are super compact and just slide across and add that much more to feeling and worn if your abs! Going to be starting a new workout program that uses them a lot so I’m excited! Got them really fast too, and great price! Def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sliders to use for my Beachbody 80 day obsession program and they are perfect. My feet don't slide off of them during the workouts. They have a nice felt like padding to help slide and it protects against scratching my hardwood floors. I've been using for 2 weeks now and they seem to be holding up nicely. Shipping was fast as well. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Quality sliders for ab and glute workouts!
customer_reviews.text: These sliders are amazing. I bought them so I could do Beachbody workouts that require them (but the Beachbody sliders are much more expensive). The fact that these work on carpet and on hard floors make them versatile and able to be used anywhere. They are durable and well made, and I'm so glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: Katie W.

customer_reviews.title: They Slip Off My Feet
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be less than perfect. I have been using furniture moving pads, which work far better than these. I find that the core gliders don’t glide easily on my carpet, and my feet seem to slip off of them constantly too. I continue to use the furniture pads for my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: LMH1917

customer_reviews.title: Great for fun exercising
customer_reviews.text: Great for at home workouts i used these on my rug smooth side down and it tones every single muscle that you use. And you can have fun while using them. Just be careful of how smooth they can glide.
customer_reviews.author: Nakita

product_meta.title: Synergee Core Sliders. Dual Sided Use on Carpet or Hardwood Floors. Abdominal Exercise Equipment
feature_bullets: ★ ULTIMATE CORE ENGAGEMENT ★ – Synergee Core Sliders are perfect for fun and challenging full-body workouts. The Sliders introduce a balance and stability challenge to every movement, which forces you to engage your core muscles and results in your abdominals becoming stronger (and better-looking) than ever!

★ COMPACT & CONVENIENT ★ – These sliders are convenient for so many reasons: they are small, light, and compact, which makes it easy to store them when not in use. Plus, every move is low-impact, reducing your risk of energy. These Sliders very portable for people who are constantly on the go or for athletes who like to workout when they travel! Fits easily into a backpack, purse, and carry-on.

★ DUAL SIDED FOR MULTIPLE SURFACES ★ – You’ll be able to bring your Sliders everywhere you go and with the dual sides you can slide on multiple surfaces! Nothing can stop you from getting your core workout in! The Foam side works best on hard, smooth surfaces like hardwood floors. The Plastic side works best on softer surfaces, like carpet or turf.

★ WHAT’S IN THE PACKAGE ★ – This package includes 2 Core Sliders in Green. Each slider is 7 inches in diameter and is accompanied by a color-printed exercise manual describing 5 different exercises you can do with them.

★ NO SWEAT GUARANTEE ★ – Leave the sweating and swearing for your training! Buying from Synergee means quick, hassle-free, and caring customer service! Plus, we offer a better-than-money-back guarantee: if there is an issue with your product for any reason, we will send you a new one quickly and absolutely FREE! 100% Customer Satisfaction is our Number 1 Goal!
